I cant help but feel really cynical and that in reality the image should be the spider being stomped on then laughed at for trying.

*cynicism intensifies*[/bq]
That's why I used the analogy; you would think that with as much money, resources, people, political pull, business pull and that political interest groups would squish geeks under their pinky, but as it turns out political groups are metaphorically shitting themselves in fear of pissing off geeks now cause of how bad of a outright asskicking their peers have gotten.
